name: POS Core Setup
description: Base Frappe app structure and POS Profile integration for restaurant system.

tasks.name: Initialize Frappe App
tasks.prompt: Create a clean Frappe app named `restaurant_management` using ERPNext v15, with proper modular structure. Include hooks.py, module folder, assets folder, and example module inside.

tasks.name: Configure POS Profile Fields
tasks.prompt: Add Custom Fields to POS Profile: `restaurant_mode`, `select_table_first`, `branch_code`, `allowed_item_groups`, `allowed_kitchen_stations`, `allow_add_item_post_kitchen`. Include these fields as fixtures.
